title: Panic on initial startup

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

labels.name: skip-changelog
labels.description: Bugs that have never been in a released stable version, and as such excluded from the release notes

body:
Since #4436 (I think), initial startup doesn't work:

```
jb@unu:~ $ STNORESTART=1 syncthing -home tmp/s1
[start] 10:04:54 INFO: Generating ECDSA key and certificate for syncthing...
[T5ZNY] 10:04:54 INFO: syncthing v0.14.40-rc.3+5-gf8015c9a "Dysprosium Dragonfly" (go1.9.2 darwin-amd64) jb@unu.kastelo.net 2017-10-28 08:03:11 UTC
[T5ZNY] 10:04:54 INFO: My ID: T5ZNYVY-VDRQ2HH-FP26UHC-FO6NOJ3-YQWK7AV-RT5LWTN-7QKBJUW-WLBQNAI
[T5ZNY] 10:04:55 INFO: Single thread SHA256 performance is 351 MB/s using minio/sha256-simd (348 MB/s using crypto/sha256).
[T5ZNY] 10:04:55 INFO: Default folder created and/or linked to new config
[T5ZNY] 10:04:55 INFO: Default config saved. Edit /Users/jb/tmp/s1/config.xml to taste or use the GUI
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x380 pc=0x43fd608]

goroutine 1 [running]:
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/config.(*Wrapper).RawCopy(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/config/wrapper.go:128 +0x58
main.loadConfigAtStartup(0xc420088190)
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing/main.go:990 +0x1cf
main.syncthingMain(0xc420014bc0, 0x10, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x4794754, 0x1, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing/main.go:664 +0x8ba
main.main()
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing/main.go:445 +0x3c9
```

This is a 0.14.40-rc.4 issue.
